document.full_text: camden, new jersey, the nation's most crime-ridden small city, on friday welcomed back 55 police officers and 31 firefighters laid off in january because of lack of funding.
document.title: nation's most dangerous small city rehires police
lines_and_colors: camden, new jersey, the nation's most crime-ridden small city, on friday welcomed back 55 police officers and 31 firefighters laid off in january because of lack of funding.
